sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with l 臁疮 ian chuang 臁疮 , shank sores. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 在腨胫间喜生疮， 中水恶露寒冻不瘥，经年成骨疽，亦名胻疮 . “There is a tendency for sores to develop in the region of the calves and shins. If they are subjected to water, malign dew, and freezing, and if this is not healed, in the course of a year this develops into a bone impediment-illness. It is also called shin sores ”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治药：胻疮，即臁疮 , “ Shin sores are shank sores”.
